steps.name: 执行测试用例: 无效字段值时注册失败

parameters.name: test_case
parameters.value: {'id': 'invalid_field_values', 'email': 'a', 'password': '1234567', 'password_confirmation': '1', 'username': 'tester tester', 'rank': 'NORMAL', 'address': 'Chicago, Illinois', 'tel': '1234567890', 'gender': 'OTHER', 'birthday': '2000-01-01', 'notification': True, 'expected_messages': {'email': 'Please enter a non-empty email address.', 'password': 'Please lengthen this text to 8 characters or more.', 'password_confirmation': 'Please lengthen this text to 8 characters or more.', 'username': '', 'address': '', 'tel': 'Please match the requested format.', 'gender': '', 'birthday': ''}, 'description': '无效字段值时注册失败'}
